p:
Finally, let us note that eq 8 describes the photoelectron interactions with the neighboring atoms in one-electron approximation; thus, the additional term S 0 2 is necessary here to account for the reduction of the EXAFS amplitude due to many electronic excitations.
30, 64 Typically the S 0 2 value is between 0.7 and 1.0, and it can be obtained from the analysis of reference materials with known structure.
